comment.author: 8437932@N04
comment._content: Rupprecht is a male forename. It seems that she was called "Princess Rupprecht", because her husbands name was Rupprecht. In former times they sometimes did that (at least in Germany), nowadays it's unusual. Her name was Marie-Gabrielle en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duchess_Marie_Gabrielle_in_Bavaria and she was married to prince Rupprecht of Bavaria, the last bavarian crown prince: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rupprecht,_Crown_Prince_of_Bavaria
